name: Gravity Jump
description: Gravity Jump - the meaning of the game is to control the flight of the blue cube, which continuously moves between the red cubes. When faced with them is the end of the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 150 MB available space
